inclusion.criterion: Over 18 years of age at screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Non-childbearing potential (i.e., physiologically incapable of becoming pregnant)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Has had a hysterectomy or Has had a bilateral oophorectomy (ovariectomy) or Is post-menopausal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Childbearing potential, has a negative serum pregnancy test at Screening, and agrees to acceptable birth control
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Chronic Genotype 1 infection as documented by at least one measurement of serum HCV RNA greater than or equal to 2,000 IU/mL during screening
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Positive test at Screening for HBsAg, anti-HBc IgM Ab, or anti-HIV Ab.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of any other clinically significant chronic liver disease
exclusion.label: unknown
